attributes.action: Financial life skills compulsory in the national curriculum for 16-18 year olds.
attributes.additional_details: It is imperative that the goverment introduces compulsory 'financial lifeskills' lessons into the national curriculum to educate us for the future.
attributes.background:
How many 16-18 do you know that can: set up a bank account, pay a bill, budget effectively and save up to take out one of those dreaded mortgages?
It about time that the government start preparing young adults to live and work independently.
